title.en: Visualization and Mantra Recitation of the Great Compassionate One

text.en: In the Buddha, the Dharma and the Supreme Assembly
text.en-trans: sangye chö dang tsok kyi chok nam la

text.en: I take refuge until I attain enlightenment.
text.en-trans: changchub bardu dak ni kyab su chi

text.en: Through the merit of practising generosity and so on,
text.en-trans: dak gi jin sok gyipé sönam kyi

text.en: May I attain buddhahood for the benefit of all beings.
text.en-trans: dro la pen chir sangye drubpar shok

text.en: For me and all sentient beings throughout the whole of space,
On the crowns of our heads, seated upon white lotus and moon
Is a Hrīḥ, out of which noble Avalokiteśvara appears—
Brilliantly white and radiating five-coloured rays of light.
He has a captivating smile and gazes with eyes of compassion.
text.en-trans: dzé dzum tukjé chen gyi zik

text.en: The first two of his four hands are clasped together,
The lower two hold a crystal rosary and white lotus.
text.en-trans: ok nyi shel treng pekar nam

text.en: He is adorned with silken garments and jewels,
text.en-trans: dar dang rinchen gyen gyi tré

text.en: And an antelope pelt is draped over his shoulder.
Amitābha, 'Boundless Light', is his crown adornment.
His two legs are in the seated, vajra posture,
And a stainless moon supports him at his back.
He is the essence and embodiment of all sources of refuge.
Precious lord, your body white and unblemished,
text.en-trans: jowo kyön gyi ma gö kudok kar

text.en: Your crown adorned with the perfect buddhas,
text.en-trans: dzok sangyé kyi u la gyen

text.en: Your eyes of compassion gazing on all beings—
text.en-trans: tukjé chen gyi dro la zik

text.en: Avalokiteśvara, to you I pay homage!
To the noble lord Avalokiteśvara and
And all the victors and their heirs,
text.en-trans: chok chu dü sum zhukpa yi

text.en: Dwelling in all directions of the universe, through past, present and future,
Sincerely and enthusiastically I pay homage!
I make offerings of flowers, incense, lamps, fragrant scents,
And food, and music, and the like —
Both physical and imaginary, created by the mind.
text.en-trans: ngöjor yi kyi trul né bul

text.en: Assembly of Noble Ones, please accept them all!
text.en-trans: pakpé tsok kyi zhé su sol

text.en: All my negative deeds throughout beginningless time until today,
The ten non-virtues and the five with immediate reckoning —
text.en-trans: mi gé chu dang tsammé nga

text.en: Sprung from this mind that is driven by destructive emotions,
I confess them all, each and every one.
With a heart full of delight, I rejoice in all the merits
Of śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas,
And every living being,
Throughout the three times.
text.en-trans: sönam la ni dak yi rang

text.en: I implore you: according to the temperament
And mental capacity of sentient beings,
Please turn the wheel of Dharma
text.en-trans: ché chung tün mong tekpa yi

text.en: Of all the vehicles — lesser, greater, and general.
text.en-trans: chö kyi khorlo kor du sol

text.en: Until saṃsāra has been completely emptied,
I beseech you: do not pass into nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: nya ngen mi da tukjé yi

text.en: But look upon us with your boundless compassion,
As we flounder in this ocean of suffering.
text.en-trans: semchen nam la zik su sol

text.en: May whatever virtue I have amassed
Become the cause of enlightenment for all;
May I quickly, without delay or deferment,
Become an excellent guide to all beings.
text.en-trans: drenpé pal du dak gyur chik

text.en: To you I pray, guru Avalokiteśvara.
To you I pray, yidam Avalokiteśvara.
To you I pray, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
To you I pray, lord of refuge Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so kyab gön chenrezik

text.en: To you I pray, loving protector Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jam gön chenrezik

text.en: Hold me in your compassion, caring and victorious one.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik gyalwa tukjé chen

text.en: For us beings who wander endlessly throughout saṃsāra
text.en-trans: tamé khorwar drangmé khyam gyur ching

text.en: And are subjected to intolerable pain and suffering,
Protector, we have no other refuge but you.
text.en-trans: gönpo khyé lé kyab zhen ma chi so

text.en: Inspire us to attain omniscience and awakening.
Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with hatred take birth in the hells,
text.en-trans: zhedang wang gi nyalwar kyé gyur té

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of intense heat and cold:
May they all be reborn in your presence, O supreme of deities!
text.en-trans: lha chok khyé kyi drung du kyewar shok

text.en: Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with miserliness take birth in the preta realm,
text.en-trans: serné wang gi yidak né su kyé

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of intense hunger and thirst:
May they all be reborn in your supreme Potala pureland!
text.en-trans: zhing chok potala ru kyewar shok

text.en: Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with folly take birth as animals,
text.en-trans: timuk wang gi düdror kyé gyur té

text.en: And experience the misery of verbal incapacity and confusion:
May they all be reborn in your presence, O protector!
text.en-trans: gönpo khyé kyi drung du kyewar shok

text.en: Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with passionate desire take birth in the human realm,
text.en-trans: döchak wang gi mi yi né su kyé

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of intense deprivation:
text.en-trans: drel pong dukngal nyongwé semchen nam

text.en: May they all be reborn in the supreme pureland, Sukhāvatī!
text.en-trans: zhing chok dewachen du kyewar shok

text.en: Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with jealousy take birth in the asura realm,
text.en-trans: trakdok wang gi lhamin né su kyé

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of conflict and dispute:
May they all be reborn in the Potala pureland!
text.en-trans: po ta la yi zhing du kyewar shok

text.en: Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with pride take birth in the deva realm,
text.en-trans: ngagyal wang gi lha yi né su kyé

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of transmigration and fall:
text.en-trans: po tung dukngal nyongwé semchen nam

text.en: May they all be reborn in the Potala pureland!
text.en-trans: po ta la yi zhing du kyewar shok

text.en: Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
May I, in this and all my future lives,
text.en-trans: dak ni kyé zhing kyewa tamché du

text.en: Through activity like that of Avalokiteśvara,
Liberate the beings of impure realms,
text.en-trans: ma dak zhing gi dro nam drolwa dang

text.en: And transmit the supreme speech of the six syllables throughout the ten directions!
text.en-trans: sung chok yik druk chok chur gyepar shok

text.en: Through the force of invoking you, the supremely noble,
text.en-trans: pakchok khyé la solwa tabpé tü

text.en: May all those whom I must discipline and guide,
text.en-trans: dak gi duljar gyurpé drowa nam

text.en: Take interest in cause and effect, strive to act virtuously,
text.en-trans: lé dré lhurlen gewé lé la tsön

text.en: And come to possess the qualities that may benefit all.
text.en-trans: drowé döndu chö dang denpa shok

text.en: Through praying single-pointedly in this way,
Rays of light stream forth from the Noble One's form,
And purify impure karmic perception and delusion.
The outer environment becomes the blissful paradise, Sukhāvatī,
And beings within it transform physically, vocally and mentally
To take on Avalokiteśvara's enlightened body, speech and mind,
And appearance, sound and awareness become inseparable from emptiness.
Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
I and others appear as the Noble One's enlightened form.
All sounds take on the melody of the six-syllable mantra,
And all thoughts are the expanse of great primordial wisdom.
Through the positivity and merit of this, may I swiftly
Attain the realization of Avalokiteśvara, and thereby
Every single sentient being
Reach his state of perfection too.
text.en-trans: dé yi sa la göpar shok

text.en: Through the merit of practising this visualization and recitation of mantra,
May I and all those with whom I am connected,
text.en-trans: dak dang dak la drel tok drowa kün

text.en: Be reborn miraculously in the blissful paradise of Sukhāvatī
text.en-trans: mi tsang lü di borwar gyur ma tak

text.en: The very moment we leave these impure bodies behind.
text.en-trans: dewachen du dzü té kyewar shok

text.en: And as soon as we are born there may we fully traverse the ten stages,
text.en-trans: kyé ma tak tu sa chu rab drö né

text.en: And send out emanations to act for others' welfare throughout the ten directions.
text.en-trans: trulpé chok chur zhendön jepar shok
